entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 22 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this morning. Temperature falling to minus 22 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
